name: passbolt
description: Passbolt is a self-hosted, API-first password manager designed for team collaboration. It features encrypted password sharing, user controls, browser extensions, and auditing tools.
features: Encrypted password storage: End-to-end encryption ensures passwords are encrypted on client side before storage, protecting against server breaches
Team sharing: Share passwords securely with team members or groups while maintaining encryption and access controls
Browser extensions: Native extensions for Chrome, Firefox, and Edge enable auto-fill and password management directly in browser
User management: Invite users, assign roles, and manage permissions to control who can access and share passwords
Audit logs: Track all password access, modifications, and sharing activities for security compliance and accountability
Groups and folders: Organize passwords into folders and share with groups for streamlined team-based access management
Password generator: Built-in generator creates strong, random passwords with customizable length and character requirements
API integration: RESTful API enables automation, integration with CI/CD pipelines, and custom workflow development
Mobile apps: iOS and Android apps provide secure password access on mobile devices with biometric authentication
Two-factor authentication: Add extra security layer with TOTP, YubiKey, or Duo support for account protection
